abstract: Oreo cookies is giving its Facebook page a global look. Another brand, Wheat Thins crackers, is starting a campaign to reward fans of the brand who discuss it on Twitter.
snippet: Oreo cookies is giving its Facebook page a global look. Another brand, Wheat Thins crackers, is starting a campaign to reward fans of the brand who discuss it on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: The number of advertisers with presences in the social media like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube are increasing faster than the lines at the supermarket when the values of the cents-off coupons are being tripled.

headline.main: Food Brands Get Sociable on Facebook and Twitter
